events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car at an intersection around 7 PM yesterday.
After review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to manage the customer's vehicle accident claim promptly.
The customer received confirmation that their car accident claim has been acknowledged and is being processed.
The insurance company requested photos of the vehicle damage and the police accident report to proceed.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed images of the carâ€™s collision damage and official reports.
The investigation team began evaluating the accident circumstances and vehicle condition to verify the claim.
The investigation was completed successfully, confirming the collision details and validating the claim.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the estimated repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and thanked the agent for timely communication.
The claim was formally approved with all necessary verifications complete and the settlement agreed upon.
Payment was issued to cover the cost of vehicle repairs, ensuring the customer can proceed without delay.
The claim case was officially closed following successful payment and customer confirmation of repair scheduling.
